titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

action.text: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Johnson. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

term.name: Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: This resolution authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs for the 116th Congress.
